p: If the anatomy of the uterine cavity was normal 3 months after the operation, embryo transfer or spontaneous pregnancy was prepared for these patients. The pregnant patients were followed until the end of pregnancy, with fetal structure screening, aneuploidy screening and routine prenatal visits. Placental complications were monitored by ultrasound examinations during the pregnant period and by pathologic examinations following placenta delivery. All patients were followed until the end of August 2017.
